TextString.Name: FreePoolString
TextString.String: Do you want to remove all spent Influence Points from this Area? It will make this Area available for one of your other Restaurants.

TextString.Name: FreePoolDesc
TextString.String: This button will allow you to remove all Influence Points spent on this area, removing the customers from the pool and making this Neighborhood available for other Restaurants.

TextString.Name: FreePoolName
TextString.String: Remove Influence

TextString.Name: DuplicateRecipeMenuButtonString
TextString.String: Duplicate Recipe

TextString.Name: DuplicateRecipeMenuButtonDesc
TextString.String: Click to create a copy of this Custom Recipe.

TextString.Name: SkillCategorySandwichName
TextString.String: Sandwiches and Burgers

TextString.Name: SkillCategorySandwichDescription
TextString.String: Cutting some kind of bread in half and putting food in it is a common and popular way to create tasty meals.

TextString.Name: SkillCategorySandwichAlternateDescription
TextString.String: Sandwiches and Burgers focused Skills - Applied to the entire Restaurant

TextString.Name: TemplateHamburgerName
TextString.String: Hamburger

TextString.Name: TemplateHamburgerDescription
TextString.String: Hamburgers are very popular sandwiches made with a sliced bun and a patty of ground meat.

TextString.Name: TemplateHamburgerSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Hamburgers are very popular sandwiches made with a sliced bun and a patty of ground meat.
Level 1 - Skill Points required: 1 This Template will be available in the Recipe Editor.
Level 2 - Skill Points required: 2 Some Editor Perks will be available in the Recipe Editor for this Template, allowing you to further increase the Recipe's final rating.
Level 3 - Skill Points required: 3 One additional Editor Perk will be available.

TextString.Name: TemplateFishBurgerName
TextString.String: Fish Burger

TextString.Name: TemplateFishBurgerDescription
TextString.String: Fish Burgers are burgers made with a Seafood patty instead of a Meat one.

TextString.Name: TemplateFishBurgerSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Fish Burgers are burgers made with a Seafood patty instead of a Meat one.
Level 1 - Skill Points required: 1 This Template will be available in the Recipe Editor.
Level 2 - Skill Points required: 2 Some Editor Perks will be available in the Recipe Editor for this Template, allowing you to further increase the Recipe's final rating.
Level 3 - Skill Points required: 3 One additional Editor Perk will be available.

TextString.Name: TemplateVeggieBurgerName
TextString.String: Veggie Burger

TextString.Name: TemplateVeggieBurgerDescription
TextString.String: Veggie Burgers are burgers made with a vegetable-based patty.

TextString.String:
Veggie Burgers are burgers made with a vegetable-based patty.

Level 2 - Skill Points required: 2 Some Editor Perks will be available in the Recipe Editor for this Template, allowing you to further increase the Recipe's final rating.
Level 3 - Skill Points required: 3 One additional Editor Perk will be available.

TextString.Name: TemplateSandwichName
TextString.String: Sandwich

TextString.Name: TemplateSandwichDescription
TextString.String: Any recipe consisting of food placed between two slices of bread can be considered a sandwich.

TextString.Name: TemplateSandwichSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Any recipe consisting of food placed between two slices of bread can be considered a sandwich.
Level 1 - Skill Points required: 1 This Template will be available in the Recipe Editor.
Level 2 - Skill Points required: 2 Some Editor Perks will be available in the Recipe Editor for this Template, allowing you to further increase the Recipe's final rating.
Level 3 - Skill Points required: 3 One additional Editor Perk will be available.

TextString.Name: TemplateGrilledSandwichName
TextString.String: Grilled Sandwich

TextString.Name: TemplateGrilledSandwichDescription
TextString.String: Improving a Sandwich is as easy as putting it on a grill.

TextString.Name: TemplateGrilledSandwichSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Improving a Sandwich is as easy as putting it on a grill.

TextString.Name: TemplateGrilledSandwichPerkName
TextString.String: Grilled Sandwich Requirements

TextString.Name: TemplateGrilledSandwichPerkDescription
TextString.String:
This Template requires you to satisfy to following requirements before being able to save the Recipe:
► Use Bread in High Quantity (100g or more).

This Template requires you to satisfy to following requirements before being able to save the Recipe:
► Use Bread in High Quantity (100g or more).

TextString.Name: TemplateHamburgerPerkDescription
PattiesCookingSkillName
TextString.String: Patties Cooking

TextString.Name: PattiesCookingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Everyone can turn a juicy patty into a crappy, dry chunk of inedible matter. Properly cooking patties require love and care.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GrillWisdomSkillName
TextString.String: Grill Wisdom

TextString.Name: GrillWisdomSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Oh Mighty Grill, whisper your secrets to me. May I cook quickly and without burning food...
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: StuffingRatioSkillName
TextString.String: Scientific Stuffing Ratio

TextString.Name: StuffingRatioSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Hiring a team of scientists to do advanced research about Sandwiches stuffing may be an overkill. Or maybe not...
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AirStuffingSkillName
TextString.String: The Legendary Trick of the Air Stuffing

TextString.Name: AirStuffingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
This supposedly legendary trick will allow you to position stuffing in your Sandwiches and Burgers in a way that allows you to use less ingredients, and use the air to fill the gaps.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: HighQualityStuffingSkillName
TextString.String: High Quality Stuffing

TextString.Name: HighQualityStuffingDescription
TextString.String:
Don't waste your time on cheap ingredients, if you want to impress your customers you need to choose the best food for your stuffings!
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: BurgerRoyaltySkillName
TextString.String: Burger Royalty

TextString.Name: BurgerRoyaltySkillDescription
TextString.String:
It's finally time to reveal your ancestry to everyone and claim the title of Burger Royalty. Yes, Royalty, we don't want to be sued!
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: DoubleSlicesMasterSkillName
TextString.String: Master of the Two Slices

TextString.Name: DoubleSlicesMasterSkillDescription
TextString.String:
You learned the ancient tricks of Sandwich-making, now you are a true master of the art.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GamingHandEyeCoordinationSkillName
TextString.String: Hand-Eye Coordination Gaming Training Program

TextString.Name: GamingHandEyeCoordinationSkillDescription
TextString.String:
You started playing at some of the hardest videogames on the market and eventually got good at them. Now your hands are fast like the wind.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PassClickName
TextString.String: Kitchen Pass

TextString.Name: PassClickDesc
TextString.String: Orders ready to be delivered
